title: Credit for record shares’ trading volume goes to PM’s policies: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 26 (APP):Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib Wednesday said the prudent economic policies of Prime Minister Imran Khan were paying dividends as the Pakistan Stock Exchange (PSX) had set a new record of trading volume of one and a half billion shares.
All the previous records of shares trading had been broken, and the credit for the historic achievement went to the prime minister’s economic policies, which had given confidence to the investors and stabilized the economy, he said in a tweet.
پاکستان سٹاک ایکسچینج میں شیئرز کا تجارتی حجم تمام تر ریکارڈ توڑ کر 1.5بلین ایک نیا ریکارڈ قائم ہوا ہے جس کا کریڈٹ وزیراعظم عمران خان کی موجودہ معاشی پالیسیوں کو جاتا ہے جس سے ملکی معیشت کو استحکام ملا اور سرمایہ کاروں کو اعتماد ملا ہے۔
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) May 26, 2021
